FuncDef: This command specifies a peer node to use for the first hop of the GMPLS LSP. If specified, this command forces the GMPLS LSP to use a specific UNI-N node on ingress to the optical network. This command is only applicable if 1toN end to end protection is used.

ParaDef.Info: The node ID of the peer UNI-N. This may be an ipv4-formatted address or a 32-bit unsigned integer. Values-a.b.c.d | 1 - 4294967295.
